sentences.sContent: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.sCn: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

sentences.sContent: ...The Blessing and Curse of the People Who Never Forget A handful of people can recall almost every day of their lives in enormous detail—and after years of research...
...An enormous amount of energy and resources went into the construction of those houses...

synos.tran: 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的

remMethod.val: e(出) ＋ norm(规范) ＋ ous(…的) → 超出规范的 → 巨大的

words.tran: 巨大地，庞大地；非常地，在极大程度上

trans.tranOther: very big in size or in amount
